text: "The Blister Exists" is the final single from Slipknot's Vol. 3: (The Subliminal Verses) album. A music video for the song was released 11 January 2007. "The Blister Exists" is known among fans for its snare drum solo. This song was used to open concerts from The Subliminal Verses tour, following a staged announcement where the audience was told that "due to unforeseen circumstances, Slipknot will not be performing this evening." ==Music video== The music video displays the band performing the song live, with clips of their fans with much similarity to "The Nameless" music video. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Site Category:Slipknot songs Category:2006 songs
title: The Blister Exists
